conbody.p:
The following log and configuration files are available on a storage enclosure:
drive_serial_mapping: displays the configuration of the disks in the enclosure
encl_err: all errors in an enclosure
enclosure: details of all disks in an enclosure, such as serial number, temperature, status, ...
lspci: displays a log of the lspci command usage
scsi: displays the SCSI command log for the enclosure
